verses.verse: חַטַּ֣את <WH2403> chat-Tat The sin יְהוּדָ֗ה <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah, of Judah כְּתוּבָ֛ה <WH3789> ke-tu-Vah [is] written בְּעֵ֥ט <WH5842> be-'Et with a pen בַּרְזֶ֖ל <WH1270> bar-Zel of iron בְּצִפֹּ֣רֶן <WH6856> be-tzip-Po-ren [and] with the point שָׁמִ֑יר <WH8068> sha-Mir; of a diamond חֲרוּשָׁה֙ <WH2790> cha-ru-Shah [it is] graven עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- upon ל֣וּחַ <WH3871> Lu-ach upon the table לִבָּ֔ם <WH3820> lib-Bam, of their heart וּלְקַרְנ֖וֹת <WH7161> u-le-kar-Not and upon the horns מִזְבְּחוֹתֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH4196> miz-be-cho-tei-Chem. of your altars

כִּזְכֹּ֤ר <WH2142> kiz-Kor remember בְּנֵיהֶם֙ <WH1121> be-nei-Hem Whilst their children מִזְבְּחוֹתָ֔ם <WH4196> miz-be-cho-Tam, their altars וַאֲשֵׁרֵיהֶ֖ם <WH842> va-'a-she-rei-Hem and their groves עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- and עֵ֣ץ <WH6086> 'etz trees רַֽעֲנָ֑ן <WH7488> ra-'a-Nan; by the green עַ֖ל <WH5921> 'al and גְּבָע֥וֹת <WH1389> ge-va-'ot hills הַגְּבֹהֽוֹת׃ <WH1364> hag-ge-vo-Hot. upon the high

הֲרָרִי֙ <WH2042> ha-ra-Ri O my mountain בַּשָּׂדֶ֔ה <WH7704> bas-sa-Deh, in the field חֵילְךָ֥ <WH2428> chei-le-Cha thy substance כָל־ <WH3605> chol and all אוֹצְרוֹתֶ֖יךָ <WH214> otz-ro-Tei-cha [and] all thy treasures לָבַ֣ז <WH957> la-Vaz to the spoil אֶתֵּ֑ן <WH5414> 'et-Ten; I will give בָּמֹתֶ֕יךָ <WH1116> ba-mo-Tei-cha [and] thy high places בְּחַטָּ֖את <WH2403> be-chat-Tat for sin בְּכָל־ <WH3605> be-chol throughout גְּבוּלֶֽיךָ׃ <WH1366> ge-vu-Lei-cha. throughout all thy borders

וְשָׁמַטְתָּ֗ה <WH8058> ve-sha-mat-Tah, And thou even thyself shalt discontinue וּבְךָ֙ u-ve-Cha מִנַּחֲלָֽתְךָ֙ <WH5159> min-na-cha-la-te-Cha from thine heritage אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which נָתַ֣תִּי <WH5414> na-Tat-ti that I gave לָ֔ךְ Lach, וְהַעֲבַדְתִּ֙יךָ֙ <WH5647> ve-ha-'a-vad-Ti-cha thee and I will cause thee to serve אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אֹ֣יְבֶ֔יךָ <WH341> 'o-ye-Vei-cha, thine enemies בָּאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> ba-'A-retz in the land אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- not יָדָ֑עְתָּ <WH3045> ya-Da-'e-ta; which thou knowest כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for אֵ֛שׁ <WH784> 'esh a fire קְדַחְתֶּ֥ם <WH6919> ke-dach-Tem not for ye have kindled בְּאַפִּ֖י <WH639> be-'ap-Pi in mine anger עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- for עוֹלָ֥ם <WH5769> o-Lam ever תּוּקָֽד׃ <WH3344> tu-Kad. [which] shall burn ס sa-Mek

כֹּ֣ה׀ <WH3541> koh Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> 'a-Mar Thus saith יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD אָר֤וּר <WH779> 'a-Rur Cursed הַגֶּ֙בֶר֙ <WH1397> hag-Ge-ver [be] the man אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who יִבְטַ֣ח <WH982> yiv-Tach that trusteth בָּֽאָדָ֔ם <WH120> ba-'a-Dam, in man וְשָׂ֥ם <WH7760> ve-Sam and maketh בָּשָׂ֖ר <WH1320> ba-Sar flesh זְרֹע֑וֹ <WH2220> ze-ro-'O; his arm וּמִן־ <WH4480> u-min- from יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh from the LORD יָס֥וּר <WH5493> ya-Sur departeth לִבּֽוֹ׃ <WH3820> lib-Bo. and whose heart

וְהָיָה֙ <WH1961> ve-ha-Yah will be like כְּעַרְעָ֣ר <WH6176> ke-'ar-'Ar A bush בָּֽעֲרָבָ֔ה <WH6160> ba-'a-ra-Vah, in the desert וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> ve-Lo without יִרְאֶ֖ה <WH7200> yir-'Eh and shall not see כִּי־ <WH3588> ki- when יָב֣וֹא <WH935> ya-Vo cometh ט֑וֹב <WH2896> Tov; when good וְשָׁכַ֤ן <WH7931> ve-sha-Chan but shall inhabit חֲרֵרִים֙ <WH2788> cha-re-Rim the parched places בַּמִּדְבָּ֔ר <WH4057> bam-mid-Bar, in the wilderness אֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> 'E-retz land מְלֵחָ֖ה <WH4420> me-le-Chah [in] a salt וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> ve-Lo without תֵשֵֽׁב׃ <WH3427> te-Shev. and not inhabited ס sa-Mek

בָּר֣וּךְ <WH1288> ba-Ruch Blessed הַגֶּ֔בֶר <WH1397> hag-Ge-ver, [is] the man אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who יִבְטַ֖ח <WH982> yiv-Tach that trusteth בַּֽיהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; in the LORD וְהָיָ֥ה <WH1961> ve-ha-Yah become יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD מִבְטַחֽוֹ׃ <WH4009> miv-ta-Cho. and whose hope

וְהָיָ֞ה <WH1961> ve-ha-Yah will be like כְּעֵ֣ץ׀ <WH6086> ke-'Etz For he shall be as a tree שָׁת֣וּל <WH8362> sha-Tul planted עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- by מַ֗יִם <WH4325> Ma-yim, by the waters וְעַל־ <WH5921> ve-'al- by יוּבַל֙ <WH3105> yu-Val by the river יְשַׁלַּ֣ח <WH7971> ye-shal-Lach and [that] spreadeth out שָֽׁרָשָׁ֔יו <WH8328> sha-ra-Shav, her roots וְלֹ֤א <WH3808> ve-Lo Nor; יִרָא yi-ra כיִרְאֶה֙ <WH3372> yir-'Eh affright קכִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- when יָבֹ֣א <WH935> ya-Vo cometh חֹ֔ם <WH2527> Chom, when heat וְהָיָ֥ה <WH1961> ve-ha-Yah become עָלֵ֖הוּ <WH5929> 'a-Le-hu but her leaf רַֽעֲנָ֑ן <WH7488> ra-'a-Nan; shall be green וּבִשְׁנַ֤ת <WH8141> u-vish-Nat in the year בַּצֹּ֙רֶת֙ <WH1226> batz-Tzo-ret of drought לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo Nor יִדְאָ֔ג <WH1672> yid-'Ag, and shall not be careful וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> ve-Lo Nor יָמִ֖ישׁ <WH4185> ya-Mish neither shall cease מֵעֲשׂ֥וֹת <WH6213> me-'a-Sot from yielding פֶּֽרִי׃ <WH6529> Pe-ri. fruit

עָקֹ֥ב <WH6121> a-Ko [is] deceitful הַלֵּ֛ב <WH3820> hal-Lev The heart מִכֹּ֖ל <WH3605> mik-Kol all וְאָנֻ֣שׁ <WH605> ve-'a-Nush above all [things] and desperately wicked ה֑וּא <WH1931> Hu; he מִ֖י <WH4310> mi Who יֵדָעֶֽנּוּ׃ <WH3045> ye-da-'En-nu. who can know

אֲנִ֧י <WH589> 'a-Ni I יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> Yah-weh I the LORD חֹקֵ֥ר <WH2713> cho-Ker search לֵ֖ב <WH3820> lev the heart בֹּחֵ֣ן <WH974> bo-Chen [I] try כְּלָי֑וֹת <WH3629> ke-la-Yot; the reins וְלָתֵ֤ת <WH5414> ve-la-Tet even to give לְאִישׁ֙ <WH376> le-'Ish every man; כְּדַרְכֹּו ke-dar-kov ככִּדְרָכָ֔יו <WH1870> kid-ra-Chav, along קכִּפְרִ֖י <WH6529> kif-Ri [and] according to the fruit מַעֲלָלָֽיו׃ <WH4611> ma-'a-la-Lav. of his doings ס sa-Mek

קֹרֵ֤א <WH7124> ko-Re [As] the partridge דָגַר֙ <WH1716> da-Gar sitteth וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> ve-Lo has not יָלָ֔ד <WH3205> ya-Lad, [on eggs] and hatcheth עֹ֥שֶׂה <WH6213> 'O-seh [them] not [so] he that getteth עֹ֖שֶׁר <WH6239> 'O-sher riches וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> ve-Lo by בְמִשְׁפָּ֑ט <WH4941> ve-mish-Pat; and not by right בַּחֲצִ֤י <WH2677> ba-cha-Tzi them in the midst; יֹמֹו yo-mov כיָמָיו֙ <WH3117> ya-Mav age קיַעַזְבֶ֔נּוּ <WH5800> ya-'az-Ven-nu, shall leave וּבְאַחֲרִית֖וֹ <WH319> u-ve-'a-cha-ri-To and at his end יִהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> yih-Yeh will be a נָבָֽל׃ <WH5036> na-Val. shall be a fool

כִּסֵּ֣א <WH3678> kis-Se throne כָב֔וֹד <WH3519> cha-Vod, A glorious מָר֖וֹם <WH4791> ma-Rom high מֵֽרִאשׁ֑וֹן <WH7223> me-ri-Shon; from the beginning מְק֖וֹם <WH4725> me-Kom [is] the place מִקְדָּשֵֽׁנוּ׃ <WH4720> mik-da-She-nu. of our sanctuary

מִקְוֵ֤ה <WH4723> mik-Veh the hope יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, O LORD כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- All עֹזְבֶ֖יךָ <WH5800> 'o-ze-Vei-cha all that forsake יֵבֹ֑שׁוּ <WH954> ye-Vo-shu; thee shall be ashamed; יִסֹורַי yi-so-rai כוְסוּרַי֙ <WH3249> ve-su-Rai they that depart קבָּאָ֣רֶץ <WH776> ba-'A-retz in the earth יִכָּתֵ֔בוּ <WH3789> yik-ka-Te-vu, shall be written כִּ֥י <WH3588> ki Because עָזְב֛וּ <WH5800> 'a-ze-Vu because they have forsaken מְק֥וֹר <WH4726> me-Kor the fountain מַֽיִם־ <WH4325> ma-yim- waters חַיִּ֖ים <WH2416> chai-Yim of living אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. the LORD ס sa-Mek

רְפָאֵ֤נִי <WH7495> re-fa-'E-ni Heal יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah-weh me O LORD וְאֵ֣רָפֵ֔א <WH7495> ve-'E-ra-Fe, and I shall be healed הוֹשִׁיעֵ֖נִי <WH3467> ho-shi-'E-ni save וְאִוָּשֵׁ֑עָה <WH3467> ve-'iv-va-She-'ah; me and I shall be saved כִּ֥י <WH3588> ki for תְהִלָּתִ֖י <WH8416> te-hil-la-Ti for thou [art] my praise אָֽתָּה׃ <WH859> 'At-tah. you

הִנֵּה־ <WH2009> hin-neh- Look הֵ֕מָּה <WH1992> Hem-mah like אֹמְרִ֖ים <WH559> 'o-me-Rim Behold they say אֵלָ֑י <WH413> 'e-Lai; to me אַיֵּ֥ה <WH346> 'ai-Yeh Where דְבַר־ <WH1697> de-var- unto me Where [is] the word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh Jehovah יָ֥בוֹא <WH935> Ya-Vo abide נָֽא׃ <WH4994> Na. now

וַאֲנִ֞י <WH589> va-'a-Ni You לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- Nor אַ֣צְתִּי׀ <WH213> 'Atz-ti As for me I have not hastened מֵרֹעֶ֣ה <WH7462> me-ro-'Eh from [being] a pastor אַחֲרֶ֗יךָ <WH310> 'a-cha-Rei-cha, to follow וְי֥וֹם <WH3117> ve-Yom day אָנ֛וּשׁ <WH605> 'a-Nush the woeful לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo Nor הִתְאַוֵּ֖יתִי <WH183> hit-'av-Vei-ti thee neither have I desired אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> 'at-Tah Yourself יָדָ֑עְתָּ <WH3045> ya-Da-'e-ta; thou knowest מוֹצָ֣א <WH4161> mo-Tza that which came out שְׂפָתַ֔י <WH8193> se-fa-Tai, of my lips נֹ֥כַח <WH5227> No-chach was [right] before פָּנֶ֖יךָ <WH6440> pa-Nei-cha thee הָיָֽה׃ <WH1961> ha-Yah. become אַל־ <WH408> 'al- nay תִּֽהְיֵה־ <WH1961> tih-yeh- become

לִ֖י li לִמְחִתָּ֑ה <WH4288> lim-chit-Tah; Be not a terror מַֽחֲסִי־ <WH4268> ma-cha-si- unto me thou [art] my hope אַ֖תָּה <WH859> 'At-tah in בְּי֥וֹם <WH3117> be-Yom in the day רָעָֽה׃ <WH7451> ra-'Ah. of evil

יֵבֹ֤שׁוּ <WH954> ye-Vo-shu Let them be confounded רֹדְפַי֙ <WH7291> ro-de-Fai that persecute וְאַל־ <WH408> ve-'al- not אֵבֹ֣שָׁה <WH954> 'e-Vo-shah me but let not me be confounded אָ֔נִי <WH589> 'A-ni, I יֵחַ֣תּוּ <WH2865> ye-Chat-tu let them be dismayed הֵ֔מָּה <WH1992> Hem-mah, like וְאַל־ <WH408> ve-'al- nay אֵחַ֖תָּה <WH2865> 'e-Chat-tah but let not me be dismayed אָ֑נִי <WH589> 'A-ni; I הָבִ֤יא <WH935> ha-Vi bring עֲלֵיהֶם֙ <WH5921> 'a-lei-Hem on י֣וֹם <WH3117> Yom upon them the day רָעָ֔ה <WH7451> ra-'Ah, of evil וּמִשְׁנֶ֥ה <WH4932> u-mish-Neh them with double שִׁבָּר֖וֹן <WH7670> shib-ba-Ron destruction שָׁבְרֵֽם׃ <WH7665> sha-ve-Rem. and destroy ס sa-Mek

כֹּה־ <WH3541> koh- Thus אָמַ֨ר <WH559> 'a-Mar Thus said יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD אֵלַ֗י <WH413> 'e-Lai, to me הָלֹ֤ךְ <WH1980> ha-Loch unto me Go וְעָֽמַדְתָּ֙ <WH5975> ve-'a-mad-Ta and stand בְּשַׁ֣עַר <WH8179> be-Sha-'ar in the gate בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> be-nei- of the children; עָם 'am כהָעָ֔ם <WH5971> ha-'Am, folk קאֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which יָבֹ֤אוּ <WH935> ya-Vo-'u come in בוֹ֙ vo מַלְכֵ֣י <WH4428> mal-Chei whereby the kings יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah, of Judah וַאֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> va-'a-Sher which יֵ֣צְאוּ <WH3318> Ye-tze-'u and by the which they go out ב֑וֹ <WH99999> vo; וּבְכֹ֖ל <WH3605> u-ve-Chol all שַׁעֲרֵ֥י <WH8179> sha-'a-Rei and in all the gates יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> ye-ru-sha-Lim. of Jerusalem

וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <WH559> ve-'a-mar-Ta And say אֲ֠לֵיהֶם <WH413> 'A-lei-hem to שִׁמְע֨וּ <WH8085> shim-'U unto them Hear דְבַר־ <WH1697> de-var- ye the word יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD מַלְכֵ֤י <WH4428> mal-Chei ye kings יְהוּדָה֙ <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah of Judah וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol and all יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah, and all Judah וְכֹ֖ל <WH3605> ve-Chol and all יֹשְׁבֵ֣י <WH3427> yo-she-Vei and all the inhabitants יְרוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> ye-ru-sha-Lim; of Jerusalem הַבָּאִ֖ים <WH935> hab-ba-'Im that enter in בַּשְּׁעָרִ֥ים <WH8179> bash-she-'a-Rim by these gates הָאֵֽלֶּה׃ <WH428> ha-'El-leh. these ס sa-Mek

כֹּ֚ה <WH3541> koh Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> 'a-Mar Thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, the LORD הִשָּׁמְר֖וּ <WH8104> hish-sha-me-Ru Take heed בְּנַפְשֽׁוֹתֵיכֶ֑ם <WH5315> be-naf-sho-tei-Chem; to yourselves וְאַל־ <WH408> ve-'al- not תִּשְׂא֤וּ <WH5375> tis-'U and bear מַשָּׂא֙ <WH4853> mas-Sa no burden בְּי֣וֹם <WH3117> be-Yom day הַשַּׁבָּ֔ת <WH7676> hash-shab-Bat, on the sabbath וַהֲבֵאתֶ֖ם <WH935> va-ha-ve-Tem nor bring בְּשַׁעֲרֵ֥י <WH8179> be-sha-'a-Rei [it] in by the gates יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> ye-ru-sha-Lim. of Jerusalem
